ttl.name: VEHICLE STABILITY CONTROL SYSTEM(w/ Pre-collision System)

para.dtcname: Steering Angle Sensor Module Component Internal Failure

content5.ptxt: The skid control ECU (brake actuator assembly) outputs this DTC when it receives an internal malfunction signal from the steering sensor.

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Steering Angle Sensor Module Component Internal Failure

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: With the +BS terminal voltage 9.5 to 17.4 V, the skid control ECU receives an error signal from the steering sensor.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Steering sensor (Spiral cable with sensor sub-assembly)

testgrp.testtitle: REPLACE SPIRAL CABLE WITH SENSOR SUB-ASSEMBLY

test1.ptxt: Replace the steering sensor (spiral cable with sensor sub-assembly).

atten3.ptxt: When replacing the steering sensor (spiral cable with sensor sub-assembly), confirm that the replacement part is of the correct specification.

atten4.ptxt: If troubleshooting has been carried out according to the Problem Symptoms Table, refer back to the table and proceed to the next step.
